verses.verse: Take heed <WG4337> <WG5720> that ye do <WG4160> <WG5721> not <WG3361> your <WG5216> alms <WG1654> before <WG1715> men <WG444>, to be seen <WG4314> <WG2300> <WG5683> of them <WG846>: otherwise <WG1490> ye have <WG2192> <WG5719> no <WG3756> reward <WG3408> of <WG3844> your <WG5216> Father <WG3962> which <WG3588> is in <WG1722> heaven <WG3772>.

After this manner <WG3779> therefore <WG3767> pray <WG4336> <WG5737> ye <WG5210>: Our <WG2257> Father <WG3962> which <WG3588> art in <WG1722> heaven <WG3772>, Hallowed be <WG37> <WG5682> thy <WG4675> name <WG3686>.

And <WG2532> forgive <WG863> <WG5628> us <WG2254> our <WG2257> debts <WG3783>, as <WG2532> <WG5613> we <WG2249> forgive <WG863> <WG5719> our <WG2257> debtors <WG3781>.

And <WG2532> lead <WG1533> <WG5661> us <WG2248> not <WG3361> into <WG1519> temptation <WG3986>, but <WG235> deliver <WG4506> <WG5663> us <WG2248> from <WG575> evil <WG4190>: For <WG3754> thine <WG4675> is <WG2076> <WG5748> the kingdom <WG932>, and <WG2532> the power <WG1411>, and <WG2532> the glory <WG1391>, for <WG1519> ever <WG165>. But <WG1161> thou <WG4771>, when thou fastest <WG3522> <WG5723>, anoint <WG218> <WG5669> thine <WG4675> head <WG2776>, and <WG2532> wash <WG3538> <WG5669> thy <WG4675> face <WG4383>;

Lay <WG2343> not <WG3361> up <WG2343> <WG5720> for yourselves <WG5213> treasures <WG2344> upon <WG1909> earth <WG1093>, where <WG3699> moth <WG4597> and <WG2532> rust <WG1035> doth corrupt <WG853> <WG5719>, and <WG2532> where <WG3699> thieves <WG2812> break through <WG1358> <WG5719> and <WG2532> steal <WG2813> <WG5719>:

But <WG1161> lay up <WG2343> <WG5720> for yourselves <WG5213> treasures <WG2344> in <WG1722> heaven <WG3772>, where <WG3699> neither <WG3777> moth <WG4597> nor <WG3777> rust <WG1035> doth corrupt <WG853> <WG5719>, and <WG2532> where <WG3699> thieves <WG2812> do <WG1358> not <WG3756> break through <WG1358> <WG5719> nor <WG3761> steal <WG2813> <WG5719>:
For <WG1063> where <WG3699> your <WG5216> treasure <WG2344> is <WG2076> <WG5748>, there <WG1563> will <WG2071> your <WG5216> heart <WG2588> be <WG2071> <WG5704> also <WG2532>.

The light <WG3088> of the body <WG4983> is <WG2076> <WG5748> the eye <WG3788>: if <WG1437> therefore <WG3767> thine <WG4675> eye <WG3788> be <WG5600> <WG5753> single <WG573>, thy <WG4675> whole <WG3650> body <WG4983> shall be <WG2071> <WG5704> full of light <WG5460>.

If <WG1487> therefore <WG3767> the light <WG5457> that is <WG2076> <WG5748> in <WG1722> thee <WG4671> be darkness <WG4655>, how great <WG4214> is that darkness <WG4655>!

No man <WG3762> can <WG1410> <WG5736> serve <WG1398> <WG5721> two <WG1417> masters <WG2962>: for <WG1063> either <WG2228> he will hate <WG3404> <WG5692> the one <WG1520>, and <WG2532> love <WG25> <WG5692> the other <WG2087>; or else <WG2228> he will hold <WG472> <WG5695> to the one <WG1520>, and <WG2532> despise <WG2706> <WG5692> the other <WG2087>. Therefore <WG1223> <WG5124> I say <WG3004> <WG5719> unto you <WG5213>, Take no <WG3361> thought <WG3309> <WG5720> for your <WG5216> life <WG5590>, what <WG5101> ye shall eat <WG5315> <WG5632>, or <WG2532> what <WG5101> ye shall drink <WG4095> <WG5632>; nor yet for <WG3366> your <WG5216> body <WG4983>, what <WG5101> ye shall put on <WG1746> <WG5672>. Are <WG1308> ye <WG5210> not <WG3756> much <WG3123> better than <WG1308> <WG5719> they <WG846>?

<WG1161> Which <WG1537> <WG5101> of you <WG5216> by taking thought <WG3309> <WG5723> can <WG1410> <WG5736> add <WG4369> <WG5629> one <WG1520> cubit <WG4083> unto <WG1909> his <WG846> stature <WG2244>?

And <WG2532> why <WG5101> take ye thought <WG3309> <WG5720> for <WG4012> raiment <WG1742>? Consider <WG2648> <WG5628> the lilies <WG2918> of the field <WG68>, how <WG4459> they grow <WG837> <WG5719>; they toil <WG2872> <WG5719> not <WG3756>, neither <WG3761> do they spin <WG3514> <WG5719>:

(For <WG1063> after <WG1934> all <WG3956> these things <WG5023> do the goyim <WG1484> seek <WG1934> <WG5719>:) for <WG1063> your <WG5216> heavenly <WG3770> Father <WG3962> knoweth <WG1492> <WG5758> that <WG3754> ye have need <WG5535> <WG5719> of all <WG537> these things <WG5130>.
